title: 06/17/2021 - HOUR 1 - Clippers, 76ers and Chris Broussard
itunes:title: 06/17/2021 - HOUR 1 - Clippers, 76ers and Chris Broussard
description:
in hour 1, Colin recaps the Clippers victory over Utah, perhaps being the best game in franchise history. 76ers have a epic meltdown in the 4th quarter and the Pelicans are having a tough time keeping Zion Williamson happy. Chris Broussard joins the show to talk NBA Playoffs and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
